channel.title: Pandemic on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Pandemic on PepsFeeder

item.title: Kind Thoughts Strategy: How to Become Tolerant of the Unknown
item.description: In March, I asked on social networks what was the most difficult for people during the COVID-19 pandemic. I got more than 100 answers and found that in many ways people have the same problem: the unknown.

item.title: Coronavirus pandemic leads Amazon to ban many non-essential items
item.description: Faced with merchandise shortages in the United States and Europe due to the Covid-19 coronavirus pandemic, Amazon has instituted sweeping changes on which products it will store and ship from its warehouses over the next three weeks, in a move it said was aimed at keeping essential items in stock and speeding up orders.

item.title: Pandemic increasingly takes over daily lives, roils markets
item.description: SEOUL, South Korea (AP) — The coronavirus pandemic has taken over daily lives around the globe, overwhelming hospitals, shuttering schools and offices, halting U.S. presidential campaign rallies and world sports while increasing fears about the financial toll.
